con:testCase.name: Invalid Field Value Tests
con:testCase.con:description: Test Various things to be fixed in Jira 7405. Request 1 - Successful request. Verify that requestID is in the response XML Request 2 - Test malformed XML. Verify correct message in in response XML. Request 3 - Tests to check that mandatory fields are checked properly. Verify correct message in in response XML. Request 4 - Login using a user not authorized to be sending request. Verify correct message in in response XML. Request 5 - Login using incorrect user/pass. Verify correct message in in response XML. Request 6 - Verify that only valid
